data.text:
@John35810470 @dr_kozik @FauciFan You can’t answer that question without proving that COVID is much worse than influenza, which was your original claim.

I don’t see why anyone would trust you on anything.
@John35810470 @dr_kozik @FauciFan How many pediatric influenza deaths occur each year on average?
@carbonbaby @dr_kozik @FauciFan Actually that graph is fake … the vaccinated are most hospitalized … unvaccinated are immune to virus https://t.co/DQANbszbQM
@John35810470 @dr_kozik @FauciFan You’re the one that brought up influenza, so I’d like to know, just how many pediatric influenza deaths do you think there are every year?

@John35810470 @dr_kozik @FauciFan Yes, this is how you got deceived.  You were told to focus on absolute numbers rather than comparative numbers.  COVID is the leading cause of non-accidental pediatric death in the US, and your numbers are in agreement with mine.

@carbonbaby @dr_kozik @FauciFan Get help your misinformation is sad 

And vaccine are nothing but placebo …
@carbonbaby @dr_kozik @FauciFan That’s 16 kids dead per state dead from COVID 19 … your analysis is Joel https://t.co/kX0ZtQpDRR

@John35810470 @dr_kozik @FauciFan You see, when people told you that it was relatively harmless in children, they were deceiving you by leaving out a very important piece of information.

Kids don’t die of any disease very often at all.  COVID is much deadlier than influenza.  It’s not close.
@John35810470 @dr_kozik @FauciFan I mean, you can just say it isn’t, but the data is public.  You can ignore it, but everyone will know.
